name: J.Krafty_Pixel Hero in a 3D World
description: Epic Megajam 2022 submission. I used this opportunity to experiment with 2D/3D hybrid gameplay. I used Clembod's country village and warrior assets for all pixel art and animations. I also used Aleksandrilvanov's stylized castle asset for the 3D environment. And finally, I utilized the tools in the Paper2D plugin for the functionality. I hope to use what I learned in this project for future jams!
